level.heading: Special glasses.
level.text: ยง 27-647 Special glasses. For types of glass other than single annealed sheet and plate glass, allowable maximum areas may be determined by multiplying values in table 10-7 by the appropriate multiplying factor listed in table 10-8. TABLE 10-8 Multiplying Factors for Various Types of Glass ======================================================================== Glass Type Multiplying Factor ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Full tempered ....................................... 4.0 Heat strengthened ................................... 2.0 Factory-fabricated double glazing ................... 1.5* Laminated ........................................... 0.6 Wired ............................................... 0.5 Sandblasted or etched ............................... 0.4 ======================================================================== * For asymmetrical units base strength on thinner lite.
